title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at North Memorial Health
Interview Descriptions: quick, easy, and an overall great interview, heard back right away, validated parking, and was easy to find. A variety of questions. I do not work here, wanting to find out information on the company but have to fill out this form to do so.
Interview Questions: Tell me about a weakness

title: Registration Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Robbinsdale, MN) in May 2023
Interview Descriptions: Everything was done online. A couple of days after I submitted my application and resume, I was ask to take a typing test. Then I got I go a request for a virtual interview with the hiring manager. I received an offer less than a week later!
Interview Questions: Describe how you handle a difficult supervisor. What would prevent you from getting to work on time? What makes you want to work in this field? How do you manage self-care?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Robbinsdale, MN) in Jan 2023
Interview Descriptions: In person interview with nurse manager that consisted of behavioral based questions. We discussed experience and qualifications as well as shift preferences. We also discussed the job responsibilities and orientation process.
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time where you collaborated as a team to achieve a goal or improve standards.

title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Minneapolis, MN) in Jan 2023
Interview Descriptions: Very positive and thorough interview in a relaxed and friendly atmosphere. Interviewer allowed me time to answer and was open and encouraging. Very satisfied. She took time and asked relevant questions in a non-threatening manner.
Interview Questions: Behavioral and situational based questions and some clinical questions as well.

title: Medical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Minnetonka, MN) in Dec 2022
Interview Descriptions: Asked multiple questions regarding my experience and background in Medical Assistant. Asked a few questions to get a feel for who I am as an individual. Asked did I have any questions after all the questions.
Interview Questions: Do I wanna work in urgent care or in primary care?

title: Emergency Room Technician Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at North Memorial Health
Interview Descriptions: Conducted interviews over the phone due to COVID restrictions. First had an interview with HR and was then scheduled for a second interview with the ER Nurse Manager and Assistant Manager.
Interview Questions: How have you dealt with difficult patients in the past? How do you ensure care is provided while ensuring your safety?

title: EMT-B Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at North Memorial Health
Interview Descriptions: Very average interview questions Very pleasant experience One question: Tell me a time where you had to gain lots of information before making a decision. Accepted the position, very excited to be working here
Interview Questions: One question: Tell me a time where you had to gain lots of information before making a decision.

title: Customer Service Representative (CSR) Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Minneapolis, MN) in Nov 2022
Interview Descriptions: I had a virtual interview with the two department managers. It was a typical structured interview, questions were not difficult to answer if you have a decent employment history as they were based on experience.
Interview Questions: Describe a time I made a mistake and how did you handle it?

title: Physician Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Minneapolis, MN) in Mar 2022
Interview Descriptions: Pretty relaxed, overall. Virtual interview (30 mins) with the recruiter and medical director, then an on-site visit, then checking 4 professional references. For reference checks, it involves a 30+ question emailed survey. Overall, responsive and pretty straight forward!
Interview Questions: Have you ever had a time when you disagreed with a coworker and how did you handle that situation?

title: RN Cardiology Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at North Memorial Health
Interview Descriptions: I attended a career fair through North Memorial and It was fairly organized. The Nurse Manager that ran my interview was respectful and organized. They had many openings to fill so the wait for a response back was very long.
Interview Questions: What are your strengths and weaknesses?

title: Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at North Memorial Health
Interview Descriptions: You will be given higher priority if your family member is doing the highering over someone who is not known by the interview committee. Experience does not necessarily help in the interview process.
Interview Questions: Why would you be a good fit?

title: Senior Internal Communications Consultant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Minneapolis, MN) in Dec 2020
Interview Descriptions: Three rounds, standard questions, all very friendly and positive. I felt like they truly wanted to get to know me and my skills, not just check boxes on their list.
Interview Questions: A past mistake and how I rectified it.

title: Radiology Technologist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at North Memorial Health
Interview Descriptions: I did a phone interview with the manager while in my room. She was very nice and ask me many questions. There were some that I didn't know, but some I do.
Interview Questions: What is one thing that you think a Radiology Technologist should have?

title: Nursing Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at North Memorial Health in Jun 2020
Interview Descriptions: It was over the phone due to COVID, but was very warm, and welcoming. The initial interview  was various questions about the previous experiences I had. Another component was regarding how my experiences would provide their unit with valuable insight and teamwork.
Interview Questions: What was a situation where you disagreed with another staff member's approach to care?

title: Pharmacy Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Robbinsdale, MN) in Jun 2020
Interview Descriptions: Entire process was done via electronic / phone methods. Very organized and professional. HR department called for initial screening. Basic competency questions were asked in order to proceed to next interview. Second interview was a conference call with two individuals who are in supervisory and managerial roles.   The questions were a bit more specific this time and the process again seemed very organized, professional, and productive.  First HR contact after application was a bit delayed due to the understandably turbulent events of Covid.  After that, the follow up interview as timely. All subsequent emails regarding next steps were timely and easy to follow. Overall very positive experience.
Interview Questions: Can you tell me about a difficult work situation and how you overcame it?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Maple Grove, MN) in Dec 2019
Interview Descriptions: Super easy and flexible with finding times that worked with my current schedule. Recruiter answered all questions in which I had about the facility and did not rush the interview which is nice.
Interview Questions: A difficult situation in which I was still able to provided compassionate care.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at North Memorial Health
Interview Descriptions: Conversational and informational. Nurse manager wanted to find the right fit for the job and took time to discuss culture on each floor and benefits of each. Interview was about 45 min long.
Interview Questions: Describe a situation in which you needed to communicate with a client from a different background

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Minneapolis, MN) in May 2019
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was very thorough. I had a phone interview first and then HR set up an in person interview in which I met with someone from the unit.
Interview Questions: The interview questions were behavioral and situational.

title: New Grad RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at North Memorial Health
Interview Descriptions: It was very relaxed. I waited at the front in the plaza until the nurse manger took me upstairs into her office. She asked me which shift I would prefer to work, and I said a .8 evenings even though there were only .7 overnights listed online. She accommodated. She then asked me about 15 interview questions then showed me around the unit. It was w6 trauma / surg. Very good experience!
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time where a coworker’s personality/ work style didnt match up with yours and how did you handle it

title: Radiologic Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at North Memorial Health
Interview Descriptions: Applied online, phone interview, then in person, then they check references, then job offer pending a drug screen and background check. The interview was fairly easy and the typical interview questions.
Interview Questions: How I handle a difficult customer?

title: Senior Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at North Memorial Health
Interview Descriptions: Mostly behavioral interview questions. The interview lasted about an hour.  The manager and director were very nice and gave lots of information on the position and the department. It was over all a great experience.
Interview Questions: Tell me of a time when you had to work with a difficult co worker.

title: Applications Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at North Memorial Health
Interview Descriptions: All behavioral questions. They stated that they had additional interviews to complete and that I would hear back in a couple weeks. I emailed the hiring manager and HR asking for an update and never received a response even saying they were going another direction.
Interview Questions: Give an example of a time you made a mistake, and what you did to fix it.

title: CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Minneapolis, MN) in May 2018
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview first with HR then they will offer you in person interview with the nurse manager of the unit. Before the in person interview you will need to give them 5 references.
Interview Questions: What are you most proud of?

title: Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Minneapolis, MN) in Feb 2018
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was brief, however, the hiring process was subpar. HR/Management did not reach out for weeks, even after multiple calls were made. Additionally, the start date was 3 months after the interview due to preceptor shortage.
Interview Questions: How do you handle adversity?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at North Memorial Health in Oct 2017
Interview Descriptions: Behavior based interview, about an hour long and asks questions you would anticipate. I heard back about the interview within days and accepted the position. Interview was with unit managers.
Interview Questions: Behavior based interview questions. Questions about type of experience you’d had clinically.

title: Clinical Supervisor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at North Memorial Health
Interview Descriptions: Submit resume, standard question and answer process, reference check and background check. They also have you submit drug testing as well. Interviewer was nice and HR was quick in the process
Interview Questions: How do you handle stress

title: Physician Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Robbinsdale, MN) in Aug 2017
Interview Descriptions: Initial interview with management/no other providers, then shadowing in the department, then an interview with management, medical director, and other providers in the department.  I didn't receive a job offer for at least a month after the interview process was completed.
Interview Questions: Tell us about a time when you had to question authority

title: Certified Nursing Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Robbinsdale, MN)
Interview Descriptions: They call you to do a phone interview and then call you to do an in person interview. You have to get 3-5 people to fill out a reference quiz online. They notify you after the in person interview and the results of the references.
Interview Questions: What was a challenging situation you have had with a patient and how did you handle it?

title: Nursing Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Maple Grove, MN) in Jun 2017
Interview Descriptions: Several days after applying online, I had a very positive phone screen for the position. I interviewed in-person the next business day, also receiving a tour of the postpartum unit I was applying to work on. The interview was about 30 minutes with the RN manager. She was very friendly and made it sound like I'd get the job. However, two days later, HR called me to let me know they had selected another candidate. Overall though, it was a positive experience.
Interview Questions: What role do you play when working with a team?

title: Hospitalist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Robbinsdale, MN)
Interview Descriptions: Interviewed directly with the medical director of the department. Scheduled promptly. Did not keep me waiting. Questions were real, not just the "clever" nonsense people read in books on interviewing.
Interview Questions: How does your prior experience prepare you for this position?

title: Certified Nursing Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Minneapolis, MN) in Apr 2017
Interview Descriptions: We went up to a room where I met with the floor manager which is pretty standard and was asked about 20 minutes of questions. Then got tour of floor.
Interview Questions: Greatest Weakness

title: Paramedic Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Brooklyn Center, MN) in Feb 2017
Interview Descriptions: Very professional.  My interviewer spent time to get to know me.  We had a great conversation. During our conversation, we discovered that we both had a lot in common.  By doing this, the anxiety of interviewing was eased and I was able to let more of myself shine through and focus and present my attributes, skills, and passion for the position.
Interview Questions: Tell me about your experience(s) from your previous organization

title: Physician Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Minneapolis, MN) in Jan 2017
Interview Descriptions: Very relaxed, easy to talk to. Felt like more of a conversation than an interview. I met with the recruiter along with two providers who would be a part of the team I was working with
Interview Questions: Give and example of when you were put in a difficult position and how you responded.

title: Financial Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at North Memorial Health
Interview Descriptions: I applied Phone screening with HR, first round Interview with supervisor, second round interview with department manager. It was not bad. They asked some behavior questions and personal questions. Also they mentioned about overtime work.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work at NMHC

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Minneapolis, MN) in Aug 2016
Interview Descriptions: The interview was face-to-face. The manager interviewing me asked the basic interview questions. She was conversational and pleasant. In the end, she gave me time to ask questions as well. She gave informational answers and seemed honest and genuine.
Interview Questions: They asked me to describe a time when I could have been a better team player.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Robbinsdale, MN) in Jul 2016
Interview Descriptions: Quick and scenario based. The interviewer was nice and it was a pretty chill 30-40 minutes. It was average, a lot of the questions were ones you would assume to be asked as a nurse.
Interview Questions: If you had an emergency with a patient but had 4 other patients to care for how would you handle that situation?

title: I T Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at North Memorial Health
Interview Descriptions:
the process took over 3 weeks. It was very unorganized and the follow through with HR was terrible. 
I applied for a job above my level and I was still called.
Interview Questions: Too many

title: Director Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Robbinsdale, MN)
Interview Descriptions: Panel interview with peers. 1:1 interviews with CEO, CFO, and President.  The interview was very light on questions, and slanted more toward what each was looking for from the chosen candidate. The process was comfortable, but lacked the rigor and behavioral based questions common to most leadership roles in todays hiring market.
Interview Questions: Minimal questions. That was surprising and challenging.

title: Coder Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Golden Valley, MN) in May 2016
Interview Descriptions: Interview went well. Didn't hear anything until inquired. 2 positions available. Very nice interviewers. Asked alot of questions and listened to answers intently.  Overall a good experience. Not so much with the follow up however.
Interview Questions: What experience do you have coding

title: IT Supervisor Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2+ months. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Minneapolis, MN) in Apr 2016
Interview Descriptions:
HR used an unorthodox, unprofessional method by using my professional references and comparing them to the other top candidate. As I didn't get the job it put me in a bad position to have to ask my references for feedback in the near future when I actually got a job offer. I'll never again provide my professional references until I am assured I am the selected candidate. This practice is just plain rude and takes advantage of the candidate. 

Everyone was very nice and I enjoyed chatting with the hiring manager. I made it to round 2 and was made to wait an excessive amount of time to find out if I got the job or not. Unfortunately the entire process took over 2 months! The process was choppy and slow.
Interview Questions: Only asked job specific questions, no standard canned interview questions.

title: Nurse Practitioner Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Minneapolis, MN) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: A lot of situational behavior based questions. Had a phone interview first and then an in person interview in a target store. The people interviewing seemed confused. Why does this have to be so long???????
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time you had to challenge authority.

title: Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Minneapolis, MN) in Jul 2015
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview, then in person interview. Positive interactions and interviewer was pleasant, easy conversation. References were contacted then offer extended. Initial offer was very low, I countered and we met in the low end of the middle.
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time you had to multi-task?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Robbinsdale, MN) in Jun 2015
Interview Descriptions: I applied online through Indeed and was contacted for an interview.  First I completed a phone screen with the manager to determine my qualifications.  Then I met with the hiring manager and the team separately.  The interview questions were pretty standard behavioral-based questions.
Interview Questions: Tell about a time you created a process or solution to improve efficiency.

title: Medical Scribe Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Minneapolis, MN) in Jun 2015
Interview Descriptions: The interview was very brief and to the point. I actually tried to hard in the interview than in the actually work. They would ask why you want to do this and what not, but specifically they might ask how you can work in medicine, and if you have any long-term goals in it. Also, if you speak a foreign language, they will quiz you on it.
Interview Questions: Parlez-vous Francais?

title: Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Robbinsdale, MN)
Interview Descriptions: I applied online, was called to come in, and met with my future supervisor. The interview was one of the easier ones I have completed over the course of my work career. The offer of employment came from the Human Resources department a few days later.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself.

title: Data Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Minneapolis, MN) in Apr 2015
Interview Descriptions: phone screen followed by in-person panel interview.  received invite plus directions. met with a panel in a conference room. mostly conversational style interview.  interviewers were very friendly, even refunded for parking
Interview Questions: what are you passionate about?

title: Finance Consultant Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Robbinsdale, MN) in Jan 2015
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview with hiring manager.  Nothing out of the ordinary.  Wanted to know if I had any healthcare background.  Also, wanted to know my managerial background and experiences.
Interview Questions: Background, experience, modeling?

title: EMT Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Minneapolis, MN) in Feb 2014
Interview Descriptions:
They are very formal, testing your ability 
, knowledge and trust worthiness. Asked many many questions and were respectable towards the answers given. Be prepared do your research on the company and have answers ready to shoot gun off.
Interview Questions: Greatest weakness

title: Mechanic Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at North Memorial Health (Brooklyn Center, MN) in May 2013
Interview Descriptions: Very relaxed.  Just asked personal questions.  Nothing too hard, really just interested in your work history and how you dealt with adversity and rules.  A lot of time was spent talking about the history of the company and its success and how it is growing in size and plans for expansion.
Interview Questions: Name a time where you had to challenge the set rules or procedure to get the job done safely?

title: Marketing Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at North Memorial Health in Apr 2013
Interview Descriptions: Phone screening with and HR representative, one in person interview with the hiring manager. Was not given a chance to meet the rest of the team or department before presented an offer.
Interview Questions: Explain your resume/work experience.
